list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Merged current working branches and resolved conflicts.

task.summary: Default task
<Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Deleted all left tree of national focuses starting with KOA_new_king.
<add_focus_koa_l, events_koa_l>:Added temporary files with national focuses (KOA, tree of King Max) and events (KOA) localisations.

<01_opinion_modifiers.txt>:Added file with opinion modifiers used in KOA national focuses. <ideas_l>:Added localisations for KOA ideas "Theodore's Grief" and "Increased Taxes". <events_l>:Added localisations for KOA events (russian translation to be added soon). <national_focus/Kingdom_Acorn.txt>:Added completion rewards for all focuses in Max's tree. <events/Kingdom_Acorn.txt>:Added events for KOA (100 - 111; empty yet). <koa.txt>:Added temporary file with KOA ideas (to be moved into main ideas file soon). Removed temp files with events localisation.

Added left part of Elias's national focuses tree. <ideas_l>:Added ideas for left part of Elias's focus tree. <events_l>:Same thing. <add_focus_koa_l>:Added localisations for Elias's focuses. <national_focus/Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Added national focuses into left part of Elias's tree. Fixed zero costs. <events/Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Added events for these national focuses. <koa.txt>: Added ideas for these focuses. <tooltips_l>:Added tooltips for these focuses (Baronies/Unions will be please/won't like this).

Completed first version of Elias' tree. <ideas_l>:Added ideas for Elias' tree. <events_l>:Added "The Conductor's Concerns" placeholder text (tbw). <add_focus_koa_l>:Added right part of Elias' tree. <national_focus/Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Added focuses, changed tooltips. <events/Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Fixed wrong option name on event koa.116. <koa.txt>:Added ideas for Elias' focuses. <tooltips_l>:Changed tooltips for Elias' focuses that describe power value changes. TODO: Rework ideas in koa.txt and check if power value changes as intended.
Reworked KOA fractions power variable change. <koa.txt>:Changed on_add effects in ideas.
Changed time costs for Elias' focuses to 28 days. <Kingdom_Akorn.txt>
Hidden Elias' focuses branch. <Kongdom_Akorn.txt>
Fixed a typo in KOA ideas. <Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:'kia' -> 'koa'
Fixed bug with KOA news event. <Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Removed 'fire_only_once' condition from news event koa.111.

Added civil war focus tree. <ideas_l>:Added ideas for civil war and fixed russian strings in english locale. <events_l>:Added bunch of event strings for civil war (most of them TBW). <add_focus_koa_l>:Added localisation string for civil war focuses. <national_focus/Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Added civil war focuses tree. <events/Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Added events for civil war. <tooltips_l>:Added tooltip saying about possible consequences.

Started implementing Sally's tree. <RCR_decisions_l>:Added "Her Majesty Path" decisions category localisation. <add_focus_koa_l>:Added "The One Who Was Ready" localisation strings. <decisions/categories/kingdom.txt>:Added "Her Majesty Path" category. <decisions/kingdom.txt>:Playing around with decisions. <Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Hidden Elias' and Civil War trees, added focus "The One Who Was Ready" into Sally's tree. <koa.txt>:Changed effect from "Stop Holding Back!" idea.

Added nobles vs populists opposition mechanic. <ideas_l>:Added translations for ideas added by completing Sally's focuses. <RCR_decisions_l>:Removed translation strings for "Her Majesty Path" decisions. <SOM_decisions_l>:Added translation strings for "Her Majesty Path" decisions. <add_focus_koa_l>:Added translation string for three first Sally's focuses. <decisions/kingdom.txt>:Moved KOA_Her_Majesty_Path decisions group up to the top to make them work (KOA_Stop_The_Rev are broken so hard that they make any decision group under them not to work). <national_focus/Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Added opposition influence change in completion rewards. <events/Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Added some new events for Sally's tree. <ideas/koa.txt>:Added idea "Pardoned for the Past". <KoA_Scripted_Effects.txt>:Added scripted effects to increase populists or nobles influence.

Reworked opposition mechanic. <ideas_l>:Added translations for opposition domination ideas. <kingdom.txt>:Added cost and timeouts for opposition domination decisions and removed effects and modifiers from them. Added all this shit into scripted effect instead. <Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Setting global flags in completion_rewards. <koa.txt>:Added ideas for nobles vs populist mechanic. <KoA_Scripted_Effects.txt>:Implemented "Nobles vs Populist" mechanic, added some scripted effects to manipulate nobles or populist influence.

Added lots of focuses into Sally's tree and scripts for north and south ideas swapping. <ideas_l>:Added translation strings for new ideas. <events_l>:Added translation strings for events from Sally's focuses. <add_focus_koa_l>:Added translation strings for Sally's focuses. <national_focus/Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Added left and right branches of Sally's national focus tree. <events/Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Added events for Sally's focuses. <koa.txt>:Added ideas for Sally's focuses. <KoA_Scripted_Effects.txt>:Added scripts to swap ideas from Sally's focuses. ~Actually, this code looks like shit, because HoI4 script language lacks basic functionality of common programming languages. If you know how to refactor this creation of fuck, let me know, plz.~
Added cental branch of Sally's focus tree. <Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Added cental focuses without effect (tba). <add_focus_koa_l>:Added translation strings for focuses (without descriptions yet).
Moved all coded stuff from temporary files into primary. <koa.txt>, <add_focus_koa_l>

Added some effects to INF focuses, also added RCR event to accept or decline tanks shipment request. <SoM_ideas_l>:Added translation strings. <INF_Events.txt>:Added some events for INF focuses. <Jackal_Land.txt>:Added some completion rewards, made some minor fixes. <RCR_Events.txt>:Added event rcr.100 (accept or decline INF shipments request).
Added Sonic Forces soundtrack into SoM station playlist. <music_l>:Added translation strings for SF OST. <som_music.asset/som_music.txt>:Added definitions of SF OST. Added music files.

Added more rewards for INF focuses and ideas+events for them. <Jackal_Land.txt>:Added completion rewards for several national focuses. <jackalstan.txt>:Added ideas for INF national focuses. <NIK_Events.txt>:Added new file for NIK events and added an event to accept or refuse to become INF's puppet. <UFA.txt>:Added ideas triggered from INF focuses. <UFA_event.txt>:Added events triggered from INF focuses.

Added more rewards for INF focuses and ideas+events for them. <SoM_ideas_l>:Added translation strings for new ideas. <tooltips_l>:Added translation strings for completion rewards. <Jackal_Land.txt>:Added completion rewards for several national focuses. <jackalstan.txt>:Added ideas for INF national focuses. <UFA.txt>:Added ideas triggered from INF focuses. <UFA_event.txt>:Added events triggered from INF focuses.

Added more rewards for INF focuses and ideas+events for them. <SoM_ideas_l>:Added translation strings for new ideas. <INF_on_actions.txt>:Created on_actions trigger for INF focuses (fires on UFA war declaration). Forgotten to push this file previously. <Jackal_Land.txt>:Added completion rewards for several national focuses. <jackalstan.txt>:Added ideas for INF national focuses.

Added completion rewards for some KOA Civil War focuses. <kingdom.txt>:Added ideas for these focuses. <Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Added completion rewards for several focuses. <SoM_ideas_l>:Added translation strings for new ideas. <SoM_add_focus_l>:Added recently written descriptions for focuses.

Attempted to fix a crash on puppeting SWA. WARNING: Edited some states and provinces to change their owners, so futher map editing is required. <EGG_decisions.txt>:Re-written EGG_Create_DEL_Swartzland decision a bit to remove unnecessary puppet effect and to add releasing SWA from KOA. <buildings.txt>:Changed states for several buildings to fix some errors. <250-SupplyArea.txt>:Added supply area for state 775. <743-Ilaichi.txt, 755-Kanaunda.txt, 756-Taradodh.txt, 773-Mav-es-Rinda.txt, 774-Dar-es-Malayali.txt>:chown'ed. Need to rollback maybe?

Added states 773 and 774 into supply area #250, changed their owner and moved "delete_unit" effect into proper scope. <250-SupplyArea.txt>:Added states 773 and 774. <743-Ilaichi.txt, 773-Mav-es-Rinda.txt, 774-Dar-es-Malayali.txt>:Changed owner back to SWA. <EGG_decisions.txt>:Moved delete_unit call into every_state scope.
Copied Pallasov_commits branch to create main develop branch. <sonic017.mod>:Added descriptor file. WARNING: Project file structure should be changed soon!
Added instructions to run the mod into README.md.

Added some completion rewards for INF focuses. <Jackal_Land.txt>:Added completion rewards for several focuses. <jackalstan.txt>:Added some ideas for INF focuses. <UFA.txt>:Added "Fake Resources" idea. <UFA_on_actions.txt>:Added check for global flag INF_Fake_Resources_Completed: if set, UFA gets idea UFA_Fake_Resources_Idea. <tooltips_l_russian.yml>:Changed description for INF_Fake_Resources_tooltip. <SoN_add_focus_l>:Added some translation strings for descriptions of focuses. <SoM_ideas_l>:Added some translation strings for ideas.

Added icons for Max' and Elias' focus trees. <gfx/interface/goals>:Added .tga icons. <SoM_goals.gfx>:Added definitions of new icons. <SoM_goals_shine.gfx>:Added definitions of shines for new icons. <Kingdom_Akorn.txt>:Changed GFX_icon_unknown to proper icons.

Revert "topbar+marshal"
This reverts commit 4572a07d
Merged current working branches and resolved conflicts.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
